ygData.subject: Re: MORE Guild info
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, at this rate they haven t been of much help so I can relate to the frustration. Its always bugged me that GM s aren t on when you need them. Kinda like
ygData.messageBody:
Well, at this rate they haven't been of much help so I can relate to
the frustration. Its always bugged me that GM's aren't on when you need
them. Kinda like Cops not being around when you need one. Their explanation
was rather screwy to me also because I know you researched the guild issue.
And as we all know, GM's can take some time to respond to out petitions,
though I had thought once we logged off, our petitions went with us and we
had to repetition..but Ive havent any idea if thats how it works.

And I also agree that the crackdown on Gay harrasment has been slight.
I don't care if Im a Green Skinned Orion..I should have some protection
from rude people other than 'Why dont you put them on your ignore list."
sigh. Sorry..Im just frustrated....


Sandy
